## 🏷️ Priority

- [ ] 🔴 Critical (blocks core functionality)
- [ ] 🟡 High (impacts user experience significantly)

## 📋 Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] Bug is fixed and no longer reproducible

- [ ] Appropriate tests added to prevent regression
